title: The Passion of Joan of Arc = The Passion of Jeanne D'Arc
creator_credit: Carl Theodor Dreyer and Societe Generale Des Films
brief_description: The script was based on original transcripts of the trial of Jeanne d’Arc, period detail was carefully researched, unusually solid sets were constructed and a monumental performance given by Falconetti as Jeanne. However, it is the films formal rigour which places it in the forefront of experimental film art. Cast includes Renee Falconetti, Antonin Artaud, Michel Simon.
